solution_line_template: The two heavy washes will use {gallons_heavy_wash} * {num_heavy_washes} = <<{gallons_heavy_wash}*{num_heavy_washes}={water_heavy_washes}>>{water_heavy_washes} gallons of water.
The three regular washes will use {gallons_regular_wash} * {num_regular_washes} = <<{gallons_regular_wash}*{num_regular_washes}={water_regular_washes}>>{water_regular_washes} gallons of water.
The light wash will use {gallons_light_wash} * {num_light_washes} = <<{gallons_light_wash}*{num_light_washes}={water_light_washes}>>{water_light_washes} gallons of water.
The two bleached loads will use an extra {gallons_light_wash} * {num_bleached_loads} = <<{gallons_light_wash}*{num_bleached_loads}={water_bleached_loads}>>{water_bleached_loads} gallons of water.

In all, {water_heavy_washes} + {water_regular_washes} + {water_light_washes} + {water_bleached_loads} = <<{water_heavy_washes}+{water_regular_washes}+{water_light_washes}+{water_bleached_loads}={total_water_needed}>>{total_water_needed} gallons of water will be needed.
